Original Paragraph: why do we collect your data; to improve the service; in order to improve our service, we have a legitimate interest to collect and process necessary data about your device when you use the service, such as its operating system version, type and model, language and wireless operator, crash reports. it helps us analyse the use of the service and fix bugs that might occurs when using the service. to show personalized advertisements; to maintain the use of the service free of charge for you, we have a legitimate interest to collect and process your device advertisment id. it helps us to show you ads that are more relevant to you. to share with you news about the service, such as the release of a new game; we may use your email address when you contact our customer service to contact you about your gaming experience with eryod soft games and notify you about company news. if you no longer wish to receive certain email notifications you may opt - out at any time by emailing us with the contact information provided in this policy.

Original Paragraph: how we use your data; advertising; when you use our service, advertising identifier and other information from your device is collected and shared with advertising partners to enable the technical delivery of ads to your device. our advertising partners may combine this information with information which they have collected about you when you use their services(or the websites or services of third parties)in order to serve you more relevant ads in our games or to improve the accuracy of their targeting and measurement systems. we recommend that you review our advertising partners privacy policies for more information. you can find below the list of our advertising partners and a link to their privacy policy: google admob - https: / / policies. google. com / privacy mopub - https: / / www. mopub. com / legal / privacy facebook - https: / / www. facebook. com / about / privacy amazon - https: / / www. amazon. com / privacy smaato - https: / / www. smaato. com / privacy addapptr - https: / / www. addapptr. com / data privacy adincube - https: / / www. adincube. com / privacy

Original Paragraph: how we may disclose your information to third parties; we do not disclose your information to third parties with the exception of our advertisment and analytics partners mentionned above. for each partner, you can have information on how they process, store and share your data in their privacy policy. international data transfers; our service is global by nature and your data can therefore be transferred to anywhere in the world. because different countries may have different data protection laws than your own country, we take steps to ensure adequate safeguards are in place to protect your data as explained in this policy. adequate safeguards that our partners may use include standard contractual clauses approved by eu commission and the privacy shield certification in case of transfers to the usa.
